name: Student Management System using PHP and MySQL SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Student Management System using PHP and MySQL Student Management System using PHP and MySQL 1"]
description: Student Management System using PHP and MySQL是一个学生管理系统。Student Management System using PHP and MySQL存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于/studentrecordms/login.php中username和password参数缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行非法SQL命令窃取数据库敏感数据。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://phpgurukul.com/
